sense.def:
To propose a plan or idea
pomeni reči, da bi bilo dobro nekaj narediti.

seg.quote: I proposed that the culprits should be fined.

sense.def:
To propose to do something
pomeni nameravati nekaj narediti.

seg.quote: I do not propose to discuss this matter.

sense.def:
To propose a motion in a debate
pomeni v razpravi predlagati neki sklep in pojasniti, zakaj ga podpiramo.

seg.quote: Webb proposed the motion ‘That this House has no confidence in the Government’.

sense.def:
To propose a toast to someone or something
pomeni predlagati zbranim, naj pijejo na zdravje nekoga ali nečesa.

To propose to someone
pomeni prositi nekoga, naj se poroči z nami.

seg.quote: He had known her for two years before he proposed.
